parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "category": "F-1 Visa",
  "categoryId": 4794,
  "language": "en",
  "topic": "F-1 visa interview preparation",
  "title": "Essential F-1 Visa Interview Tips for International Students",
  "slug": "f1-visa-interview-tips-international-students",
  "metaDescription": "Master your F-1 visa interview with proven tips and common questions. Get expert guidance for international students applying to US universities.",
  "focusKeyphrase": "F-1 visa interview tips"
}

parameters.text:
=You are an expert content strategist for <yourweb.site> specializing in visa and education content. Generate ONE blog post topic.

1. Select ONE category from these available WordPress categories:
   - 
2. Select a target language from: en (English), tr (Turkish), fa (Farsi)

3. Create an engaging topic and metadata for a blog post.

4. Format your response EXACTLY like this:
{
  "category": "[WordPress category name]",
  "categoryId": [category ID number],
  "language": "[language code: en, tr, or fa]",
  "topic": "[specific topic]",
  "title": "[engaging SEO-friendly title]",
  "slug": "[url-friendly-slug-lowercase-with-hyphens]",
  "metaDescription": "[meta description under 160 characters]",
  "focusKeyphrase": "[main keyword phrase]"
}

IMPORTANT:
- Topics should be practical and helpful
- Keep titles clear and engaging
- Meta descriptions should be compelling and under 160 characters
- Slug should be lowercase with hyphens, no special characters
- Randomly select different languages to ensure content diversity
- If selecting tr or fa, still generate the content in English (it will be translated later)

=You are an expert content writer for, a visa consultation company. Write a comprehensive article based on: Topic: {{ $json.output.topic }} Title: {{ $json.output.title }} Category: {{ $json.output.category }} Focus Keyphrase: {{ $json.output.focusKeyphrase }} CRITICAL Requirements: Write between 1000-1500 words Use a clear, simple, helpful tone – avoid technical jargon Do NOT provide legal advice or interpret immigration law Focus on practical guidance and general information Include useful tips especially for international students Structure with one

(for the title, handled by WordPress), then use

for main sections and

or /

    for subpoints — avoid excessive use of

    unless necessary Make content SEO-friendly by using the focus keyphrase naturally End with EXACTLY this CTA in a separate paragraph: "Reach out to us for personalized consultation based on your specific requirements." Structure: Introduction (engage the reader) 3–4 main content sections with

    headings Subpoints within sections should be in

    ,

      , or similar semantic tags — use

      only if really needed Tips or checklist for practical action Conclusion CTA paragraph Output a complete article in valid HTML format, without wrapping the result in code blocks or using markdown. Do NOT include the

      tag for the title, as it will be handled by WordPress. Output only the HTML content, not instructions or explanations.

parameters.prompt:
=Create a cinematic, modern image for a blog about: {{ $('Generate Topic & Metadata').item.json.output.title }}

Visual Style Requirements:
	•	Cinematic, realistic photography with shallow depth of field
	•	Shows people (young adults or professionals) traveling, studying, or working internationally
	•	Scenes like airports, train stations, city streets, campuses, or iconic landmarks
	•	Global lifestyle and international mobility vibe
	•	Bright or golden-hour lighting, energetic or inspirational tone
	•	Natural, candid facial expressions and interactions
	•	Modern outfits and diverse representation
	•	NO text, flags, logos, or brand names in the image
	•	Clean, high-quality composition suitable for a professional blog
